mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T07_PER_PUSH ( PER_NO , REGISITRATIONID , IMSI , LAST_DATE , LAST_TIME ) VALUES ( #{PerNo} , #{RegisitrationID} , #{IMSI} , curdate() , curtime() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T07_PER_PUSH SET PER_NO = #{PerNo} , REGISITRATIONID = #{RegisitrationID} , IMSI = #{IMSI} , LAST_DATE = curdate() , LAST_TIME = curtime() WHERE ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "ID" , PER_NO AS "PerNo" , REGISITRATIONID AS "RegisitrationID" , IMSI AS "IMSI" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T07_PER_PUSH WHERE ID = #{ID}
SELECT ID AS "ID" , PER_NO AS "PerNo" , REGISITRATIONID AS "RegisitrationID" , IMSI AS "IMSI" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T07_PER_PUSH WHERE ID = #{ID} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "ID" , PER_NO AS "PerNo" , REGISITRATIONID AS "RegisitrationID" , IMSI AS "IMSI" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T07_PER_PUSH WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
